homeintro.title: Welcome to TDE5 Heroes!
homeintro.text:
### A lot of customization options

Customize the views the way you need them: Use text filters, different sort orders and category filters. You can also get hints for skills recommended by culture. You need an option that is not available? Suggest it!

### Planned: Groups

We will add a group management system later on. This allows you to view and compare group members side by side. You will also be able to use it during a game session to manage life points, order in combat and all that stuff easily.

### Planned: Custom Rules

TDE5 offers an easy way to customize the rules. You want to create a new special ability? Or a race or a profession? Or you just want to change the AP cost for an advantage? Yes, it will come. At some point.
